node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `uservars` ( `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `setting_name` varchar(40) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `setting_value` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`,`setting_name`), KEY `user_id` (`user_id`), KEY `setting_name` (`setting_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
node.title: uservars
